announcements.title: Hell yeah!
announcements.subtitle: How to add announcements
announcements.content:
With your favorite text editor, open '/mods/ui/web/screens/title.js'.
Below the 2 URLs at the top, add any sources you like (in quotes). Don't forget to add commas at the ends!
The last source should not have a comma.

- xXx420weed69xXx
